name: Pocket Dootie
description:
Manufacturer: ejew.in

Product Description:

Pocket Dootie is the state of the art Virtual Pet Buddy you can take anywhere. He will protect you with his handy dandy switch blade. Just flip the switch on top (with your mouse in the simulated version) to brandish your stainless steel knife, and take on any challengers! Challenge online Dooties by plugging in your Dootie to your parent's phone line (not available in the simulated version.) Have fun. TODAY.

Controls:

  • F9: fix unfortunate accident
  • Right Click: right-click and drag to change the camera position and orientation
  • Left Click: on certain physical buttons to engage or disengage maximum safety or interactivity
  • Z / Q / G / Escape / Backspace: exit menu / highlight menu / cancel animation
  • X / E / F / Space / Enter: select menu item / confirm / accept
  • A / W / Left Arrow / Up Arrow / Page Up: navigate the menu backwards / previous option
  • D / S / Right Arrow / Down Arrow / Page Down: navigate the menu forwards / next option
